name: MI DIGITAL
description:
MI DIGITAL is a custom software development and automation company of dedicated experts in engineering and marketing. Our capacity to help customers is a result of implementing best practice software development processes in our execution.
Here at MI DIGITAL, we specialize in Ruby on Rails and React full stack development. While each of our developers specializes on the front end or back end for the business logic or data model, we expect all all our team members to be familiar with both layers. We think that works better in an Agile environmnt it supports flexibility, creates highly efficient teams, and allows for a higher level of collaboration through project lifecycle.
All this is done with one goal in mind: working in partnership with your team to produce high quality software. No outcome short of that is acceptable.
